name: Systematic Insanity
description:
Nami - a Perfect Student - receives a "special award" on her Graduation Day
- but then inherits the challenges of its illogical consequences.

Her popularity.. her intelligence.. - and even her beauty - become "gambling tokens"
- in a "social survival game" tailored just for her.

Witness the Story of Nami as she confronts the spell of a crazy conpiracy!

Will she win against the modern witchcraft of social manipulation?

Systematic Insanity is like reading a novel while watching a movie.

Novels are read.

Movies are watched.

Why not try "reading a movie"?

This Cinematic Reading Experience is now available on Steam!
